name: Gear Gauntlet (itch)
description:
Please Vote Now on Steam Greenlight

Imagine a crazy combination of the original Sonic's bonus stages, Super Meat Boy without the platforming & Guitar Hero and you're kind of there.

Gear Gauntlet is a challenging twitch based side scroller that will put you through your paces. Don't take your eye off that ball or you will meet certain fate.

Don't concern yourself with enemies or the fate of the world, simply focus on you.

Gear Gauntlet is an evolution of time trials with your ability to focus on the task at hand being the only thing that will get you through to the end.

Think you are fast? Think again! Or better yet, prove it on the Gear Gauntlet leaderboards. Test skills, reflexes, memory and perseverance on some of the most gruelling, non-stop gauntlets you will ever face.

At the end of it all, you can check to see just who on your friends list has been able to not only beat the gauntlet – but also beat YOU!
